Test.Name: Wrong response: no responce for GetServices

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ADVANCED_SECURITY-2-1-17 Get All Certifications Paths - CA
STEP 1 - Get Advanced Security service address Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

ADVANCED_SECURITY-2-1-17 Get All Certifications Paths - CA
STEP 1 - Get Advanced Security service address Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE WARNING: The SOAP FAULT returned from the DUT is not as expected: fault subcodes sequence is incorrect. Expected: env:Receiver/ter:ActionNotSupported/ter:NoSuchService, actual: env:Receiver STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Advanced Security service address Advanced Security service address not found STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

ADVANCED_SECURITY-2-1-17 Get All Certifications Paths - CA
STEP 1 - Get Advanced Security service address Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Advanced Security service address Advanced Security service address not found STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
